trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESVLT2016_00315_MAIDVLT00315_000_000<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var> to you, adventurer, and may the flowers of love ever blossom in your heart! If you should desire to learn more of the Valentione's Day festivities, please do not hesitate to ask. I shall be only too eager to share with you everything I know.

TEXT_FESVLT2016_00315_MAIDVLT00315_000_010<tab>The very question we seek to address! For why do so many hearts across this fair realm torment themselves with unspoken ardors? Do they fear the pain that might come with rejection? It is a pity indeed, to think that fear might cause some to miss the unbridled joy that comes with reciprocation.

TEXT_FESVLT2016_00315_MAIDVLT00315_000_011<tab>Thus do we of the proud Ishgardian house of Valentione come to Eorzea this day, bringing with us several masterful fortune-tellers, to make plain the potential for love to blossom between two would-be sweethearts. We hope these revelations will help those in doubt gain the confidence to confess their true feelings to the ones they hold dear.

TEXT_FESVLT2016_00315_MAIDVLT00315_000_012<tab>Alas, it seems that many are scared, or perhaps skeptical, of the truths we offer them. And so we seek the aid of adventurers who wish to have their fates known, so that their example may draw the bashful out from hiding.
TEXT_FESVLT2016_00315_MAIDVLT00315_000_013<tab>Our fortune-tellers are awaiting in Limsa Lominsa. If you would assist us in our amorous quest, go there and speak with Lisette de Valentione.

TEXT_FESVLT2016_00315_MAIDVLT00315_000_020<tab>It is a time of celebration, when we honor the life of Countess Arabelle de Valentione: a high lady of Ishgard, who struck out against her life of cosseted detachment, and risked all in pursuit of a pure and all-consuming love.

TEXT_FESVLT2016_00315_MAIDVLT00315_000_021<tab>In the years after the countess's passing, a tradition became established among the Ishgardian populace: every year at this time would they strive to emulate her passion and her bravery, by plucking up their own courage and bestowing a token of love upon the object of their affections.

TEXT_FESVLT2016_00315_MAIDVLT00315_000_030<tab>Lady Lisette is a direct descendant of Countess Arabelle de Valentione, and her very image, both in beauty and in spirit. Whether it is by her tireless exhortations or simply by her captivating presence, there is none who stokes the fires of passion in Eorzean hearts more than she.

TEXT_FESVLT2016_00315_MAIDVLT00315_000_031<tab>Men want her, and women want to <var 1A 02 /var>be<var 1A 01 /var> her. And many the other way around. But how can my words do justice to such a light as hers? If you wish to learn more of my lady, pray speak with her yourself. She is ever eager to meet new faces...provided they are willing to submit to her command.
